project_overview.summary: Sino Group launched Sino Inno Lab in 2018 to enhance Hong Kong's innovation ecosystem. The lab fosters a culture of continuous learning among staff, deepening their understanding of cutting-edge technologies. ioio contributed by creating an engaging 3D projection experience within an apartment unit.

featured_image_with_text.content: The Lab showcases a diverse array of cutting-edge products and solutions for hotels, residences, shopping malls, and property management. Its aim is to enhance services by leveraging innovative technology. We hope to elevate customer experiences, unlocking new possibilities in smart living and fostering the development of a smarter community.

featured_text_1.content: We envision a future where show flats transcend traditional boundaries, offering a limitless sales experience beyond four walls.

subtitle_and_body_1.subtitle: Projection System
subtitle_and_body_1.body: The show flat presents a unique opportunity to ignite inspiration and ignite the imagination of potential buyers. Additionally, the versatile projection system can be adapted for use in various cuboid environments.

highlighted_content_with_gallery_1.title: Expanding possibilities
highlighted_content_with_gallery_1.content: The projection system not only served to inspire potential buyers but also provided practical insights into space utilization. It showcased how the space could be used effectively and demonstrated actual measurements on a scale directly. This immersive experience helped visitors visualize the potential of the interior and make informed decisions based on a realistic representation of the space.

highlighted_content_with_gallery_2.title: Process
highlighted_content_with_gallery_2.content: We take pride in our seamless transition between the virtual and physical realms. Despite challenges posed by the show flat's elongated shape, limited space, and low ceiling height, we tailored a projection plan to accommodate varying wall resolutions and fine-tuned every detail on-site, becoming essential.
